padding.description: Applies a default responsive page padding
padding.description_zh: 应用默认的响应式页面填充

style-fn.description: Override default CSS style applied to the component (sets minHeight); Function(offset: Number) => CSS props/value: Object; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
style-fn.description_zh: 覆盖应用于组件的默认 CSS 样式（设置 minHeight）;函数（offset： number） => CSS props/value： Object;为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围中引用它，不要内联定义它
